duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage patient check-in and check-out process, including verifying insurance and updating patient information.
Assist with scheduling appointments, answering phone calls, and providing administrative support to the healthcare team.
Ensure a professional and courteous patient experience, addressing their inquiries and concerns with empathy and efficiency.
Perform TB screening and comply with HIPAA regulations and healthcare privacy policies.
Conduct research on care and well-being resources to assist patients with obtaining necessary information.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree or High School Diploma or GED
